lore: Shauna Vayne is a deadly, remorseless Demacian monster hunter, who has dedicated her life to finding and destroying the demon that murdered her family. Armed with a wrist-mounted crossbow and a heart full of vengeance, she is only truly happy when slaying practitioners or creations of the dark arts, striking from the shadows with a flurry of silver bolts.
title: the Night Hunter
blurb: Shauna Vayne is a deadly, remorseless Demacian monster hunter, who has dedicated her life to finding and destroying the demon that murdered her family. Armed with a wrist-mounted crossbow and a heart full of vengeance, she is only truly happy when...
allytips: Tumble has many uses, but it cannot pass over walls.
Condemn can be used to both pin targets to walls to ensure a kill, or to escape a pursuer.
Don't go in first to a large teamfight. Wait for your teammates to initiate.

passive.name: Night Hunter
passive.description: Vayne ruthlessly hunts evil-doers, gaining 30 movement speed when moving toward nearby enemy champions.
passive.sanitizedDescription: Vayne ruthlessly hunts evil-doers, gaining 30 movement speed when moving toward nearby enemy champions.

enemytips: Vayne is fragile - turn the pressure up on her and she will be forced to play cautiously.
Deny Vayne the opportunity to pin you against walls.
name: Vayne

spells.name: Tumble
spells.description: Vayne tumbles, maneuvering to carefully place her next shot. Her next attack critically strikes.
spells.sanitizedDescription: Vayne tumbles, maneuvering to carefully place her next shot. Her next attack critically strikes.
spells.tooltip:
Vayne rolls a short distance, and deals {{ f1 }} bonus physical damage on her next basic attack within {{ e3 }} seconds.

Tumble's bonus damage is equal to {{ e1 }}% of Vayne's total attack damage.
spells.sanitizedTooltip: Vayne rolls a short distance, and deals {{ f1 }} bonus physical damage on her next basic attack within {{ e3 }} seconds. Tumble's bonus damage is equal to {{ e1 }}% of Vayne's total attack damage.

spells.name: Silver Bolts
spells.description: Vayne tips her bolts with a rare metal, toxic to evil things. The third consecutive attack or ability against the same target deals a percentage of the target's maximum Health as bonus true damage. (Max: 200 damage vs. Monsters)
spells.sanitizedDescription: Vayne tips her bolts with a rare metal, toxic to evil things. The third consecutive attack or ability against the same target deals a percentage of the target's maximum Health as bonus true damage. (Max: 200 damage vs. Monsters)
spells.tooltip:
Every third consecutive attack or ability against an enemy deals an additional {{ e1 }}% of the enemy's maximum health as true damage (no less than {{ e2 }}).

Silver Bolts deals no more than {{ e3 }} damage against monsters.
spells.sanitizedTooltip: Every third consecutive attack or ability against an enemy deals an additional {{ e1 }}% of the enemy's maximum health as true damage (no less than {{ e2 }}). Silver Bolts deals no more than {{ e3 }} damage against monsters.

spells.name: Condemn
spells.description: Vayne draws a heavy crossbow from her back, and fires a huge bolt at her target, knocking them back and dealing damage. If they collide with terrain, they are impaled, dealing bonus damage and stunning them.
spells.sanitizedDescription: Vayne draws a heavy crossbow from her back, and fires a huge bolt at her target, knocking them back and dealing damage. If they collide with terrain, they are impaled, dealing bonus damage and stunning them.
spells.tooltip:
Fires a bolt that knocks back a target and deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) physical damage.

If the target collides with terrain, the damage is increased to {{ f1 }} and the target is stunned for {{ e3 }} seconds.

Condemn's damage is increased by {{ e2 }}% if the target collides with terrain.
spells.sanitizedTooltip: Fires a bolt that knocks back a target and deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) physical damage. If the target collides with terrain, the damage is increased to {{ f1 }} and the target is stunned for {{ e3 }} seconds. Condemn's damage is increased by {{ e2 }}% if the target collides with terrain.

spells.name: Final Hour
spells.description: Readying herself for an epic confrontation, Vayne gains increased Attack Damage, Invisibility during Tumble, and triple the bonus Movement Speed from Night Hunter.
spells.sanitizedDescription: Readying herself for an epic confrontation, Vayne gains increased Attack Damage, Invisibility during Tumble, and triple the bonus Movement Speed from Night Hunter.
spells.tooltip:
Vayne gains {{ e1 }} bonus attack damage and improvements to Night Hunter and Tumble for {{ e2 }} seconds. The duration of Final Hour is extended by {{ e5 }} seconds whenever a champion damaged by Vayne dies within {{ e6 }} seconds.

Night Hunter: Vayne instead gains {{ e4 }} movement speed.
Tumble: Vayne will also gain Invisibility for {{ e3 }} second when she Tumbles.

Stealth - Invisible: Vayne can only be revealed by nearby enemy Turrets or True Sight.
Final Hour's duration can't be increased beyond its original maximum duration.
spells.sanitizedTooltip: Vayne gains {{ e1 }} bonus attack damage and improvements to Night Hunter and Tumble for {{ e2 }} seconds. The duration of Final Hour is extended by {{ e5 }} seconds whenever a champion damaged by Vayne dies within {{ e6 }} seconds. Night Hunter: Vayne instead gains {{ e4 }} movement speed. Tumble: Vayne will also gain Invisibility for {{ e3 }} second when she Tumbles. Stealth - Invisible: Vayne can only be revealed by nearby enemy Turrets or True Sight. Final Hour's duration can't be increased beyond its original maximum duration.
